Text: Anyone having trouble getting the crack to work?

Not a comment about the upload but about the program.

Just so that everyone who has and is new to Windows 8 know, you don't need this for Windows 8 as Windows 8 can mount iso by itself. 

Besides the previous version is so buggy it killed my Windows 8. When first installed into just released Windows 8 I had no issues until a month or so later when DAEMON Tools started randomly crashing, after trying to troubleshoot this for a week, my Windows 8 suddenly said its dll files were corrupted. Its so bad I can't even use reset/refresh properly. I lost half the windows features.

Crack doesn't work for me, Program can't find DAEMON Tools Pro license.

Win7 SP1 64bit
